application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Partial approval of details pursuant to condition 3 (materials) parts B (render), E (external doors) and F (gate) of planning permission ref. P2023/2609/FUL dated 27/03/2024.
decision_conditions:
Drawings:
NORTHBURGH RAMP ENTRANCE GATE; NORTHBURGH RAMP ENTRANCE GATE SAMPLE SECTION (sheet 1 revision B); NORTHBURGH RAMP ENTRANCE GATE – SAMPLE (sheet 2 revision B); NORTHBURGH RAMP ENTRANCE GATE – SAMPLE (sheet 3 revision B); 13715-PCO-00-DR-A-45100 Revision A (Proposed Ground Floor Ceiling Scoping Plan); 13715-PCO-DR-A-22200 dated 23/08/24 (Windows & Doors Scoping Elevations – 01 & 02); 2804-GSS-00-BSF-DR-0800 Revision 0 (South Façade Ground Flr ND.00.01, ND.00.02); 2804-GSS-00-BSF-DR-0801 Revision 0 (South Façade Ground Flr ND.00.01, ND.00.02); 2804-GSS-00-BSF-DR-0802 Revision 0 (South Façade Ground Flr ND.00.01, ND.00.02); 2804-GSS-00-BSF-DR-0803 Revision 0 (South Façade Ground Flr ND.00.01, ND.00.02); 2804-GSS-GF-BSF-DR-001 Revision 02 (External Doors-Ground Floor Mock Up Sample); 2804-GSS-XX-BSF-DR-0001 Revision P01 (Great Sutton Street-Ground Floor Elevation, Plan and Section); 2408-GSS-XX-BSF-DR-3001 Revision P00 (Window Details 01 Horizontal Section Details); 2804-GSS-XX-BSF-DR-3002 Revision P00 (Window Details 02 Vertical Section Details).

P238.de Conni S Product Datasheet; K445a.de Reinforcing mesh 4x4 Product Datasheet; K457b.de Quarzgrund Pro Product Datasheet; Rocksilk EWI Slabs; P241a.de SM700 Product Datasheet; R-TFIX-8S Universal facade fixings Datasheet; Planning Design Submission Render Details; Janisol Doors; Schuco Tur ADS 70.HI Datasheet; Comar Architectural Aluminium Systems Brochure; Cover Letter dated 26 November 2024.
